data.enText: existing in all parts of a place or thing; spreading gradually to affect all parts of a place or thing
data.chText: 遍布的；充斥各处的；弥漫的

data.enText: A sense of social change is pervasive in her novels.
data.chText: 她的小说里充斥着社会变化的意识。

example: armed with permeative irony...he punctures affectations
an error is pervasive if it is material to more than one conclusion

example.ex: ...the pervasive influence of the army in national life...
example.tran: 在国民生活中军队的影响无处不在

example.ex: She lives with a pervasive sense of guilt.
example.tran: 她生活在深深的愧疚之中。

value.def: Something, especially something bad, that is pervasive is present or felt throughout a place or thing.
value.tran: 遍布的；贯穿始终的；四处弥漫的
